member.name: PRJ_NOTIFY_TYPES
member.summary: Types of notifications describing a change to the file or folder.

summary.para: If specified on virtualization instance start:

item.description: This indicates that notifications should not be sent for the virtualization instance, or a specified subtree of the instance.

summary.para: If specified in response to a notification:

item.description: This indicates that notifications should not be sent for the specified file or folder until all handles to it are closed.

summary.div: Note If this bit appears in a notification mask, it overrides all other bits in the mask. For example, a valid mask with this bit is treated as containing only PRJ_NOTIFY_SUPPRESS_NOTIFICATIONS.

summary.para: If specified on virtualization instance start:

item.description: This indicates that the provider should be notified when a handle is created to an existing file or folder.

summary.para: If specified in response to a notification:

item.description: This indicates that the provider should be notified if any further handles are created to the file or folder.

summary.para: If specified on virtualization instance start:

item.description: The provider should be notified when a new file or folder is created.

summary.para: If specified in response to a notification:

item.description: No effect.

summary.para: If specified on virtualization instance start:

item.description: Indicates that the provider should be notified when an existing when an existing file is overwritten or superceded.

summary.para: If specified in response to a notification:

item.description: Indicates that the provider should be notified when the file or folder is overwritten or superceded.

summary.para: If specified on virtualization instance start:

item.description: Indicates that the provider should be notified when a file or folder is about to be deleted.

summary.para: If specified in response to a notification:

item.description: Indicates that the provider should be notified when a file or folder is about to be deleted.

summary.para: If specified on virtualization instance start:

item.description: Indicates that the provider should be notified when a file or folder is about to be renamed.

summary.para: If specified in response to a notification:

item.description: Indicates that the provider should be notified when a file or folder is about to be renamed.

summary.para: If specified on virtualization instance start:

item.description: Indicates that the provider should be notified when a hard link is about to be created for a file.

summary.para: If specified in response to a notification:

item.description: Indicates that the provider should be notified when a hard link is about to be created for a file.

summary.para: If specified on virtualization instance start:

item.description: Indicates that the provider should be notified that a file or folder has been renamed.

summary.para: If specified in response to a notification:

item.description: Indicates that the provider should be notified when a file or folder has been renamed.

summary.para: If specified on virtualization instance start:

item.description: Indicates that the provider should be notified that a hard link has been created for a file.

summary.para: If specified in response to a notification:

item.description: Indicates that the provider should be notified that a hard link has been created for the file.

summary.para: If specified on virtualization instance start:

item.description: The provider should be notified when a handle is closed on a file/folder and the closing handle neither modified nor deleted it.

summary.para: If specified in response to a notification:

item.description: The provider should be notified when handles are closed for the file/folder and there were no modifications or deletions associated with the closing handle.

summary.para: If specified on virtualization instance start:

item.description: The provider should be notified when a handle is closed on a file/folder and the closing handle was used to modify it.

summary.para: If specified in response to a notification:

item.description: The provider should be notified when a handle is closed on the file/folder and the closing handle was used to modify it.

summary.para: If specified on virtualization instance start:

item.description: The provider should be notified when a handle is closed on a file/folder and it is deleted as part of closing the handle.

summary.para: If specified in response to a notification:

item.description: The provider should be notified when a handle is closed on the file/folder and it is deleted as part of closing the handle.

summary.para: If specified on virtualization instance start:

item.description: The provider should be notified when it is about to convert a placeholder to a full file.

summary.para: If specified in response to a notification:

item.description: The provider should be notified when it is about to convert the placeholder to a full file, assuming it is a placeholder and not already a full file.

summary.para: If specified on virtualization instance start:

item.description: This value is not valid on virtualization instance start.

summary.para: If specified in response to a notification:

item.description: Continue to use the existing set of notifications for this file/folder.
